Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, just west of a nightclub-like building.
Room.LongDescription: In mysterious glowing letters, the words "Silk Dreams" lights up the sky and the building to the east. There appears to be a lot of activity in the building, but it looks like access is pretty restrictive. There is a burly bouncer at the door into the building that doesn't look like he's having that good of a time watching people walk by.
